item.title: Brexit and the new Heathrow runway are interconnected.
item.description: Steve Peers Zac Goldsmith, the Member of Parliament for Richmond Park, recently resigned, triggering a by-election. This decision stems from his opposition to the proposed Heathrow Airport runway expansion. Goldsmith, intending to run as an independent, aims to frame the by-election as a referendum on the runway. His opponents, particularly the Liberal Democrats, plan to broaden the conversation to include Brexit. However, Brexit and the Heathrow expansion are fundamentally intertwined.
